name: Design Heuristics
description:
Have feedback? I am @KavirKaycee on Twitter


When designing interfaces collaboratively, we come across decisions that are subjective. To make decisions objective, we created a list of heuristics based on Nielsen-Norman group's original list.


Read more on Design Heuristics here https://thediscourse.substack.com/p/design-heuristics-the-discourse-3
